page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE:-1. by Toni.
page.content: There are 5 people in my family;mum, dad,me,and two older brothers.The school I go to is called Baddesley Ensor Middle School.One of my brothers is at Nuneaton Technical College and my other brother is at Atherstone School. My two brothers work part-time on a milk round.They earn about Â£8 for the weekend job and Â£9 for the week job. My dad is a tiler and plasterer.He is self-employed.He goes to lots of places like Kettering,Derby and Coventry. My mum does hairdressing.She travels from house to house in her Vauxhall Astra doing ladies' hair.Sometimes she works from my Grandma's house which is in the village.
